isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - SKIRT PANELS, AERO SIDE SKIRT PANELS, BODY AIR DEFLECTORS, BUMPERS AND ROOFS - 0. ROOF AIR DEFLECTOR - AERODYNAMIC ROOF AIR DEFLECTOR- DAY CAB

svcproc.title: AERODYNAMIC ROOF AIR DEFLECTOR- DAY CAB

svcsubproc.title: Remove
svcsubproc.para: In March 1999, International introduced an aerodynamically sculptured air deflector for the 9900i model day cab series. This roof deflector assembly for each tractor is shipped to the dealer directly from the air deflector manufacturer unpainted. It will be the dealer's responsibility to paint and install the roof deflector assembly. Special note: If a customer requests that an after market aerodynamic sculptured type air deflector be installed on an existing cab and chassis, the dealer should advise the customer of the possible lack of sub-structure required to secure the air deflector. The installation of proper brackets in the cab sub-structure would require extensive interior work for the attachment of the air deflector hardware. An air deflector cannot be installed without the proper mounting sub-structure in the cab roof.

para.emph: An Assistant is required for both the removal and installation of the Aerodynamic Roof Air Deflector.

caution.para: Care should be taken not to mar the paint on the roof during the air deflector removal or installation.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 36 for the following Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Begin at rear of cab, street side, loosen and remove the 5/16-18 x 1.0" SST hex head bolts, SST washers and 5/16-18 cad plated hex lock nuts (Item 3) that secure the upper side extenders to the roof air deflector. Remove the upper side extender mounting brackets (Item 4). Follow the same procedure to remove the curb side bolts and related hardware.
Remove two (2), 1 each side (Item 16), 3/8"-16 x 1.0" hex head body mounting bolt and SST washer (Item 16) at front of deflector over windshield.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 38 for the following Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove 5/16-18 x 1.0" SST hex head bolt, SST flat washer, 5/16-18 cad plated hex lock nuts from air deflector rear mounting brackets and air deflector mounting channel support (Items 8 and 9).
With an assistant, remove the roof aerodynamic roof air deflector assembly.

Removal of rear roof mounting brackets if required. Remove 3/8-16 x 1.0" SEMS screws (Item 7) from roof air deflector mounting brackets (Item 1) and air deflector mounting channel support (Item 8). Remove seal and roof bow mounting bolt (Item 2), and bracket and gasket adapter plate fitting (Item 4).
Follow procedure in Step 5 to remove the opposite side rear mounting bracket.
Loosen and remove (4) (Item 7) per side, 3/8-16 x 1.0" SST SEMS screws and gasket adapter plate fitting (Item 4) each side.

svcsubproc.title: Install - Aerodynamic Roof Air Deflector, Day Cab

para.emph: An Assistant will be required to install the roof air deflector.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 38 for the following Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Align the front mounting brackets with the weld nut brackets in the cab roof sub-structure. Insert the 3/8-16 x 1.0" SST SEMS screws (Item 7) with gasket adapter plate fitting. Hand tighten.
Follow the same procedure on the opposite side mounting bracket as described in Step 1.

Align the rear air deflector roof brackets with sub-structure weldnuts at rear of cab roof. Install the 3/8-16 x 1.0" SST SEMS screws and tighten. Note: Do not overtighten. Overtightening may cause roof to buckle inward and put stress on sub-structure bracket attachments.
Place blanket or tarp on roof to protect paint and finish before placing deflector in position.

Install the air deflector mounting support channel (Item 8) on the rear cab air deflector mounting brackets (Item 1). Insert 5/16-18 x 1.0" SST hex head bolts, SST flat washers and 5/16-18 cad plated hex lock nuts (Item 9) through the support channel and rear air deflector mounting brackets.
With an assistant, place air deflector assembly on cab roof and align the front mounting holes with the front roof mounting brackets (Items 5 and 6).
Install 3/8-16 x 1.0" SST SEMS screws and flat washers (Item 7).
Align air deflector with rear mounting bracket holes and rear mounting support channel. Install 3/8-16 x 1.0" SST SEMS screws and tighten.

Attach rear side extenders ( Items 1 and 16, Figure 37)
and bolt to air deflector side extender attachment plates each side.

Attach trim flex moulding ( Item 2, Figure 37)
.

caution.para: Do not overtighten bolts and screws as damage may occur to the air deflector.

note.para: After market aerodynamic roof air deflectors cannot be installed on cabs that do not have the cab roof brackets and mounting assemblies already installed in the cab roof sub-structure.
